subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: The Book of the Dead: Your Guide to the Afterlife
description: A quick, practical guide to The Book of the Dead: Your Guide to the Afterlife.

hook.text: It was the ultimate travel guide â€” for the dead. Spells, maps, and passwords to navigate the Egyptian underworld.

buildup.text: The Book of the Dead was a collection of spells placed in tombs. It guided souls through the dangerous afterlife.

discovery.text: The critical moment: your heart is weighed against a feather of truth. If heavier with sin, a monster devours you.

twist.text: Spells could be purchased. Wealthier Egyptians bought more protection. Even salvation had a price tag in Egypt.

climax.text: The Book of the Dead shows humans have always tried to control what happens after death. Faith is a hedge against fear.

punchline.text: Spells for the dead, bought by the living. Egypt sold afterlife insurance.

quiz.question: What was the Book of the Dead?
options: A collection of spells to guide souls through the afterlife
